description: Starting through a pathFull of problems and dangersHomer wanted to have some moneyAs Maria cleaned the shopMiguel saw to the customersAnd Jose danced around the tree of life Then an Indian took him in a journeyTo the ends of the earthFull of ghosts and coca leavesWhere Homer found some papersThat changed his lifeBringing apocalypse to his soul
